comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: www.cwgc.org/find-war-dead/casualty/491918/NEWTON,%20FRANK Rank:Private Service No:45002 Date of Death:26/10/1917 Age:23 Regiment/Service:Northumberland Fusiliers 1st/5th Bn. Grave Reference III. E. 7. Cemetery POELCAPELLE BRITISH CEMETERY Additional Information: Son of Frank and Annie Lucy Newton, of 128, Crompton Rd., Macclesfield. In 1901 7yr old Frank was living with his parents and his maternal grandmother at 116 Brook Street, Macclesfield. His father, also Frank, was a Clothier. By 1911 Frank was a Clothier's Apprentice. The family had moved to 128 Crompton Rd, Macclesfield where they occupied 8 main rooms. The census returns show that Frank was the only surviving child of Frank Snr and Annie Lucy.
